A.name: Business & Strategy
A.requirements: Describe the company's business overview, products/services, business model, competitive strengths, and growth strategies. Use factual data from the provided context. Include key metrics (revenue, market position, store counts, etc.) where available.

B.name: Industry & Market
B.requirements: Describe the industry overview, market size, growth trends, competitive landscape, and market performance. Use data from the provided context. Cite figures and comparisons where available.

C.name: Risk Factors
C.requirements: List and explain material risks: industry, business, operational, financial, regulatory, and investment-specific risks. Each risk should have a clear heading and explanatory paragraph. Tone: cautionary and factual.

D.name: Financial Performance & Condition
D.requirements: Describe financial performance: revenue, expenses, profitability, balance sheet, cash flow, liquidity. Include key ratios and trends. Use figures from the provided context. Analytical and objective tone.

E.name: Use of Proceeds & Capital Structure
E.requirements: Describe share capital structure, use of proceeds, allocation of funds. Include ownership structure, holdings, equity arrangements. Use data from the provided context.

F.name: Management, Governance & Incentives
F.requirements: Describe directors, senior management, board composition, governance. Include biographical profiles and key responsibilities. Factual and positive tone.

G.name: Legal, Regulatory & Compliance
G.requirements: Describe key regulations governing the business, compliance status, licenses, regulatory overview. Neutral and informative tone.

H.name: Offering Mechanics & Share Structure
H.requirements: Describe offering structure, share mechanics, allocation, listing arrangements. Include timetable and procedural details if available.
